Title: It Was the Worst Day of My Life
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Michael Russo, Sarah L. Thompson (executive story editor), Daniel Robinson (story editor), Matthew Cruz (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Rome Flynn
Plot: After Annalise chooses Gabriel as her second chair, the unexpected duo puts all of their time into Nate Sr.'s murder re-trial as they try to get a jury to grant an insanity plea. Meanwhile,...
